experience.title: Asst. Risk Consulting Associate
experience.description: The key projects include:* PPT Automation: Automated a PPT including different types of editable graphs and tables using R and created an app using R Shiny. I also incorporated interpretation of graphs using exhaustive prompting using Copilot.* App Development: Developed applications for scorecard summary from different portfolios in R Shiny. They included several automated features like alerts on errors and several check and visual features.

experience.title: Intern
experience.description: I worked on automation of output files for Economic Capital estimation for a bank.I utilized tools and techniques in R to generate pivot tables in excel .The process of automation involved creation of pivot tables for different types of bank portfolios using dplyr package and involved usage of openxlsx package in R to get the data tables created in R on an Excel worksheet in different tabs keeping in mind the formatting of the tables as demanded by the client.The project also involved automation of scenario files like baseline scenario, stress scenarios . I utilized the same code which I developed for portfolio files automation with minimal changes in code.
experience.description_html: I worked on automation of output files for Economic Capital estimation for a bank.I utilized tools and techniques in R to generate pivot tables in excel .The process of automation involved creation of pivot tables for different types of bank portfolios using dplyr package and involved usage of openxlsx package in R to get the data tables created in R on an Excel worksheet in different tabs keeping in mind the formatting of the tables as demanded by the client.The project also involved automation of scenario files like baseline scenario, stress scenarios . I utilized the same code which I developed for portfolio files automation with minimal changes in code.

projects: [{"title":"IPL ANALYSIS(2008-2020)","description":"The aim of this project is to automate the team and individual players records in IPL (2008-2020), so that we can retrieve their stats by just calling the required functions.The Key functions are :1)team : It is a function which returns all statistics about a team including top run scorers,most destructive batsman,top 4 hitters,top 6 hitters,top wicket takers,top strike bowlers,most economical bowlers,the poor bowlers,Top run scorers by season,Top wicket takers by season .We also get to know about the impact players for each team.over_analysis : It returns the top run scorers for each over taking team name as parameter .position_runs : It returns the top run scorers for each position taking team name as parameter .tvt : It returns the analysis of one team against other, It involves two functions: *batting_vsteam : It returns the batting records versus a bowling team . *bowling_vsteam : It returns the bowling records versus a batting team .2)batter_perf : It takes the name of batter as input and returns all statistics about a batter. It includes several functions .3)bowler_perf : It takes the name of bowler as input and returns all statistics about a bowler. It includes several functions"},{"title":"IPL PROJECT DEPLOYMENT USING R SHINY","description":"This is continuation of IPL Analysis project and in this we have deployed the R code in web using R Shiny.We utilized R Shiny to deploy the project on a web app .Using the tools of shiny we were able to deploy the project and the project is https://chandranshujain03.shinyapps.io/Ipl_2/"}]
